rdf:Description.dc:title: Justice business plan 2001
rdf:Description.dc:description: Plans cover three years and are prepared in accordance with the Government Accountability Act.

Ministry of Justice consists of the Dept. of Justice as an entity for reporting puropses as well as the Alberta Review Board, the Fatality Review Board, the Judicial Council , the Notaries Publiec Review Committee, the Provincial Court Nominating Committee, and the Rules of Court Committee
